title: Acer Travelmate B118t
body:
Acer TravelMate B118-T
Reliable, durable, and compact, this Acer TravelMate B118-T is designed for students and professionals on the move. Built with a rugged, rubberized chassis and a spill-resistant keyboard, itâ€™s tough enough for daily travel and comKey Specifications:
Processor: Intel Core i3-6100U @ 2.30GHz

Memory: 4GB RAM

Storage: 32GB eMMC Solid State Storage

Operating System: Windows 11 Home (Fully Activated)

Display: 11.6" HD (1366 x 768) ComfyView LED

Portability: Lightweight "Tiny Tank" design with long-lasting battery life

Connectivity: HDMI, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SD Card Reader, and 5g wifi
